name: Tomb Raider - Duo
text:
1 "Tomb Raider" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can equip "Raiding Tool" cards from your GY to this card up to the number of "Tomb Raider" monsters you control. You can activate the effects of "Raiding Tool" cards equipped to this card as Quick Effects. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Raiding Tool" card equipped to it. Your opponent cannot target other "Tomb Raider" monsters for an attack.
